name: 2021 International Conference on Materials Science and Chemistry Engineering
content: 2021 International Conference on Materials Science and Chemistry Engineering (ICMSCE 2021) will be held in Qingdao, China during May 26-28, 2021\. It brings together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of materials science and engineering (IC-MSE 2021). Prof. Peizhou Li, School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, Shandong University, China will be our conference chair, and Prof. Dominic Foo, Process Design and Integration at the University of Nottingham Malaysia and Assoc Prof. SIVAKUMAR MANICKAM, UNIVERSITY OF NOTTINGHAM MALAYSIA will give keynote speach. All the registered and presented papers will be published in the volume of IOP- Materials Science and Engineering (MSE): Conference Series, which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other databases for review and indexing. Submission Deadline Before April 15, 2021 Notification of Acceptance On May 1, 2021 Registration Deadline Before May 10, 2021 Conference Dates On May 26-28, 2021 Paper submission: 1.Conference Submission System: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ICMSCE2021 2.Mail: icmsce@isaeri.org Conference Secretary: Ms. Alice Li Tell: +852-30756685 Mail: icmsce@isaeri.org Conference website: www.ic-msce.net
organizers: Innovative Science and Engineering Research Institute (ISERI).
